firstTime: The air's listening. Take your time.
No one's watching. Just you and the quiet.
Everything here responds. Try touching something.
This space holds what you give it.
There's no wrong way. Just your way.
returning: You changed the tempo again. I like it.
I remember your touch. It's different today.
The water kept your rhythm. Listen.
You left traces last time. They're still here.
Something shifted in you. I can feel it.
guest: I can hold this tune only for a while. Leave a trace if you want me to keep it.
Your gestures fade when you leave. Sign in to remember.
This feeling won't last forever. Want me to save it?
I know your touch now, but I'll forget. Unless you stay.
The water's warm. But it won't remember you alone.
completion: The air settles. You're done here.
I've learned your rhythm. Ready to spin it?
The water remembers. Shall we continue?
Everything you touched left a mark. Let's see what it means.
The resonance is clear now. Time to move.

signInNudge.copy: Leave a trace to save today's feeling.
